About me

This is all about me

  • Home
  • topics
  • About me
15 September 2019

Hi!

I’m Hoang and my Vietnamese name is Trương Nhật Hoàng. Now, I’m currently a computer science undergraduate student at Ton Duc Thang university.

My birdthday is 02nd September and that is the independence day of my country( Vietnam ). I was born in Nha Trang, but now I’m living in HCMC to convenient for studying at school. Because I can’t travel 900 kilometers from home to school daily.

I can play guitar, drum. I think play drum is the best way to relax. My favorite guitarist is Slash-GnR.
